oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Risālah fī al-ʻamal bi-rubʻ al-dāyirah al-ālah al-maʻrūfah / taʼlīf al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻAllāmah ʻIzz al-Dīn ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz ibn Muḥammad al-Wafāʼī al-Muwaqqit bi-Jāmiʻ al-Muʼayyad : manuscript, 1673
Risālah fī al-ʻamal bi-rubʻ al-dāʼirah
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Wafāʼī, ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz ibn Muḥammad , active 15th century
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Master Microforms, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Written in one column, 23 lines per page, in black rubricated in red.
According to colophon (f. 5r), copy completed on 12 Shawwāl 1083 AH [January 30, 1673 AD] in the hand of Ibrāhīm ibn Sulaymān ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz al-Ḥanafī al-Shāmī al-Jīnīnī (?).
Could be identical with one of the works listed in Brockelmann, G, II, 129-130; S, II, 160.
MS Arab 382. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Astronomy, Arab
Astronomical instruments
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: وفائي، عبد العزيز بن محمد، , active 15th century
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: رسالة في العمل بربع الدائرة
رسالة في العمل بربع الدايرة الآلة المعروفة / تأليف الشيخ الامام العلامة عز الدين عبد العزيز بن محمد الوفائي الموقت بجامع المؤيد : مخطوطة، 1673
